notes: [Fixed] Fixed a bug where looping through the field data on the front end could return the days out of order, if the user that saved it had a different Week Start Day than Sunday.
[Fixed] Fixed a PHP error that occurred if the current user’s Week Start Day setting was set to Sunday.
[Improved] Store Hours fields now respect users’ Week Start Day settings.
[Improved] Updated to take advantage of new Craft 2.5 plugin features.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where blank times were being saved as arrays.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where times were not reflecting the system timezone.
